mapper.insert:
select qnaboard_seq.nextval from dual
insert into QNABOARD(qnaboard_no,qnaboard_title,qnaboard_question,id,time_posted) values(#{boardNo},#{title},#{question},#{memberVO.id},sysdate)
mapper.select: select qnaboard_no,qnaboard_title,qnaboard_answer,time_posted from QNABOARD where id=#{value} order by qnaboard_no desc
select m.id,m.name,q.qnaboard_no,q.qnaboard_title,q.qnaboard_answer,q.qnaboard_question,q.time_posted,q.time_answered from QNABOARD q,pet_member m where qnaboard_no=#{value} and q.id=m.id
select q.qnaboard_no,q.qnaboard_title,q.qnaboard_answer,m.id,m.name,q.time_posted from QNABOARD q,pet_member m where q.id=m.id order by q.qnaboard_no desc
select q.qnaboard_no,q.qnaboard_title,q.qnaboard_answer,m.id,m.name,q.time_posted from QNABOARD q,pet_member m where q.id=m.id and q.qnaboard_answer is NULL order by q.qnaboard_no desc
select q.qnaboard_no,q.qnaboard_title,q.qnaboard_answer,m.id,m.name,q.time_posted from QNABOARD q,pet_member m where q.id=m.id and q.id=#{value}
